name: Gravity Thief (J.jaramillor)
description: "Gravity Thief" is a 2D pixel art stealth game where the objective is to collect pieces of flags without being noticed by guards or security cameras. The player controls a character with gravity-defying boots, allowing them to switch gravity and walk on roofs to avoid detection and reach flag pieces in hard-to-reach places. The game requires careful planning and quick reflexes to outwit the guards and cameras, with a single mistake leading to failure and starting the level over again.
